projects.title: JustHomz (BlackOpal Services)
projects.bodyText:
- Built and maintained 100% of backend REST services using Nestjs. 
 - Worked in an agile team with 2 designers and 6 other developers to create a rapid prototype. 
 - Done POC on Agora Apis for In-app audio and video calling. 
 - Built in-app call, and video call feature with plan and subscription APIs. 
 - Built DB schema and API specs from scratch.

projects.title: Vegease
projects.bodyText:
- Built a marketing scheme feature for redeeming coins on the basis of user order value. 
 - Built combo product feature, selling multiple products as a combo at a low price. 
 -Built Combo Offer Feature

projects.title: JAMS
projects.bodyText:
- System to guide students to get the best career counseling for colleges abroad. 
 - Developed a mentor-student feature for guiding the students, like which course they have to choose.
